events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product is not what I purchased.
System assigned the case to the Refund cluster due to keywords related to money back and exchange requests.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to review and resolve the refund request reported by the customer.
Hello, I’m Sarah from support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item so we can verify the issue and proceed?
Sure, my order number is 456789123. I have attached a photo showing the item I received is different from what was listed.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the help resolving this issue.
The refund has been initiated and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Checking in to confirm that your refund was received and the return process was completed to your satisfaction.
Since there are no further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
